tweet_text: @WifeWorst Take the time to mourn, and mourn thoroughly. See a counselor if you aren’t already, and work through the trauma. Find your people, and cherish your time with them. The best advice I got was “If a day at a time feels too long, take it an hour at a time. Or a minute. Or a breath.”
